long_description: # Sparking Wand Mod **Compatible with: ** (1) Mineclone (2) Minetest Default Game ## Instructions 1. Find everything to craft *magic sticks* 2. Find everything to craft the *wand* using *magic sticks* 3. Produce some coal dust. Happy sparkling! ## Crafting See the crafting tables below:
name: forfun
short_description: Craft a wand with which you can cast a lightning spell. Great for discovering caves.
